data.text: Terrible things will happen to Nineveh,
But now listen to the enemy soldiers coming to attack Nineveh;
Look at their flashing swords and glittering spears
All that will happen because Nineveh is like [MET] a beautiful prostitute
So the Commander of the armies of angels says to the people of Nineveh:
I will cause rubbish/garbage to be thrown at you;
All those who see you will turn their backs to you and say,
Your city is certainly [RHQ] no safer than Thebes city was.
The rulers of Ethiopia and Egypt helped Thebes;
You people of Nineveh will similarly become dazed and drunk,
Your enemies will cause the walls around your city to fall down
Store up water now to use when your enemies surround the city!
Nevertheless, your enemies will burn your city;
In your city there are now very many merchants;
Your leaders are also like a swarm of [SIM] locusts [DOU]
O King of Assyria, your officials will all be dead [EUP];
You are like someone who has a wound that cannot be healed;
